original_text: All those listed of the camp of Judah, by their companies, were 186,400. They shall set out first on the march.
korean_text: 유다 진영에 속한 군대로 계수된 군인의 총계는 십팔만 육천사백 명이라 그들은 제일대로 행진할지니라

sentences.original_text: All those listed of the camp of Judah
They shall set out first on the march.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 행진할 때에 맨 먼저 출발할 것이다
